# System Memory Hierarchy

## Description

| Type       | Size   | Access Time |
|------------|--------|-------------|
| L1 Cache   | 256 KB | 2 ns        |
| L2 Cache   | 1 MB   | 5 ns        |
| L3 Cache   | 6 MB   | 30 ns       |
| DIMM (ram) | 16 GB  | 100 ns      |
| SSD        | 256 GB | 50 micro s  |
| HDD        | 2 TB   | 5 ms        |
